mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ide_message_list (application_id, message_name, message_description, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date) VALUES (#{applicationId}, #{messageName}, #{messageDescription}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedDate})
mapper.select: SELECT message_id , application_id , message_name , message_description , created_by , created_date , updated_by , updated_date FROM ide_message_list WHERE application_id = #{applicationId} ORDER BY message_name ASC
